text: 5.15: Ro 14.7-8; 1 Ko 6.19; Ga 2.20; 1 Te 5.10; 1 T 2.6; 1 Pi 4.2Mba guma, ana ntige nza khar ki gumgi, ana nzan kurkurar zav, ana mba tɨva muuŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza ntigem kha ndɨkndɨgar muunga fhu. Nza nduarira khar ka rui, nza wari won vuzvuga zɨn ŋgɨrga. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza mba nzan ŋana ndigap, rimgiap, taagia khavgi guma, nza ana ndɨkndɨgɨrga. Nza ana ndɨkndɨgɨp, ana vuzvugar rurga.
